refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: QandADiv is a section of a QandASet. A question and answer set might be divided into sections in order to group different sets of questions together, perhaps by topic.
A QandASet may contain any number of QandADiv or QandAEntry elements, but it cannot contain a mixture of both at the same level.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A table of contents for the question and answer set is sometimes generated, especially in online environments.
